personal-statement:
I help organizations solve issues with automation and process improvement. I am passionate about
modernizing legacy processes using automation. I have a strong desire to make people's lives better
with automation and integrations, speeding up work and making people more efficient.

work_history.text: See all previous roles at linkedin.com/in/cmathews393

work.name: Endsight
highlights: Spearheaded large scale project aimed at reducing alert noise for NOC Engineers, using Streamlit and Python data tools to visualize and slice data for investigation and trend analysis

Utilized multiple (4+) vendor APIs, internal services, and Python, with Streamlit and FastAPI to create and track projects and identify outliers in datasets (e.g. firewalls with vulnerable firmware), merging data across disparate systems for a unified overview.
Fostered an environment of collaboration by working with other internal teams, vendors, and fellow teammembers to establish goals and improve team capability.

work.name: Flextechs
highlights: Worked with clients to improve monitoring of backups and internal systems
Led an effort to improve framework compliance (HIPAA, PCI) and internal system security
Led recovery efforts after security incidents, including ransomware attacks.

work.name: IP Services
highlights: Improved skill with networking technologies (Solarwinds, Fortigate, Juniper, Cisco)
Assisted in the deployment and management of network infrastructure in a small colocation environment with around 15 clients.

achievements.text: 100k lines of code authored in private work repositories, ~10k+ lines in open source projects
